questions.question: What are our four client offerings?
questions.answer: Research Programs, Conferences, Consulting, Digital Markets

questions.question: What are the names of two members of our OC (excluding Gene Hall)?
questions.answer: Val Sribar, Claire Herkens, Joe Beck, Alwyn Dawkins, Ken Allard, Akhil Jain, Michael Diliberto, Jules Kaufman, Robin Kranich, Craig Safian, Yvonne Genovese, Scott Hensel

questions.question: What are two functions that we serve?
questions.answer: IT, Service, Legal, Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, Human Resources, Finance

questions.question: What are our three strategic objectives?
questions.answer: Must-Have Research, Compelling Interactions, Operational Excellence

questions.question: What are our three research models?
questions.answer: Analysis & Evaluation, Peer & Practitioner Research, Quantitative Analytics & Data Science (QUADS)

questions.question: What are two Advisory activities?
questions.answer: Lead Inquiry (Client Calls), Provide Written Responses, Present and Support Events, Support Research and Sales

questions.question: What is one part of the Compelling Interactions Framework?
Who connects clients with Advisors for Inquiry calls?
What are two Analysts activities?
questions.answer: Conduct Research and Write Content, Lead Inquiry, Present and Support Events, Support Research and Sales

questions.question: What are two A&E Content Types?
questions.answer: Impact Appraisal, Best Practices, Cool Vendors, First 100 Days, Hype Cycle, Strategic Roadmap, Magic Quadrant, Critical Capabilities, Market Guide

questions.question: He was an archaeologist. What is that?
